headline.main: Powers of the Board of Health They are Ministerial, and Not Judicial.; SUPREME COURT GENERAL TERM.

docs.lead_paragraph: The People ex rel. James Savage vs. The Board of Health. This was the return to a writ of certiorari directed to the Board of Health, commanding them to return to the Court their Proceedings, by which it was determined that the business carried on by the relator, in depositing manure on lots between First-avenue and East River, and Thirty-eighth and Thirty-ninth streets, was a nuisance.
